document.full_text: the n.b.a. finals may depend heavily on who starts or finishes in coverage against lebron james or dirk nowitzki, but there are a number of other potential mismatches that could play a significant role in crowning the league's champs.
document.title: sussing out the other matchups of the n.b.a. finals
lines_and_colors: the n.b.a. finals may depend heavily on who starts or finishes in coverage against lebron james or dirk nowitzki, but there are a number of other potential mismatches that could play a significant role in crowning the league's champs.
